mapper.select: SELECT mhfComWriter, mhfComContent, mhfComRegDate, mhfComNo, mhfNo, mmNo FROM mhfindcomm WHERE mhfComDelYn = 'N' AND mhfNo = #{mhfNo} ORDER BY mhfComNo DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mhfindComm(mhfComNo,mhfComContent, mhfComWriter, mmNo, mhfNo ) VALUES(mhFind_seq.NEXTVAL,#{mhfComContent}, #{mhfComWriter}, #{mmNo}, #{mhfNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE mhfindComm SET mhfComContent = #{mhfComContent}, mhfComRegDate = SYSTIMESTAMP WHERE mhfComNo = #{mhfComNo}
UPDATE mhfindComm SET mhfComDelYn = 'Y' WHERE mhfComNo = #{mhfComNo}
